validationRules.implementationComplete: All batches must be completed with quality validation
validationRules.qualityStandardsMet: Code must meet all established quality standards and SOLID principles
validationRules.testCoverageAchieved: Test coverage must meet or exceed minimum targets
validationRules.performanceTargetsMet: Performance requirements must be achieved within baseline metrics

implementationDeliverables: Complete implementation following strategic guidance and architectural patterns
Comprehensive testing with coverage targets achieved
Quality validation results with SOLID principles compliance
Performance optimization within established baseline requirements
qualityEvidence: Test coverage reports with detailed coverage metrics
Performance validation results with baseline comparisons
Security implementation validation with pattern compliance
Code quality assessment with SOLID principles verification
reviewRequirements: Comprehensive quality review against established standards
Acceptance criteria validation with evidence documentation
Performance and security verification with baseline validation
Final approval for production readiness assessment

contextPreservation.implementationResults: Complete implementation with quality validation and testing results
contextPreservation.qualityEvidence: Comprehensive quality validation evidence and compliance verification
contextPreservation.performanceMetrics: Performance validation results with baseline comparisons
contextPreservation.securityValidation: Security implementation validation with pattern compliance
contextPreservation.testingResults: Test coverage and validation results with detailed metrics
contextPreservation.architecturalCompliance: Architectural pattern compliance and SOLID principles verification

validationRules.contextComplete: Complete implementation context must be provided for architectural guidance
validationRules.questionsSpecific: Specific architectural questions must be clearly formulated
validationRules.progressDocumented: Current implementation progress must be documented with evidence
validationRules.supportScopeDefinied: Scope of architectural support needed must be clearly defined

implementationContext: Current implementation progress with completed and pending work
Specific architectural challenges or design decisions needed
Integration points and compatibility requirements with existing systems
Performance or quality concerns requiring architectural input
architecturalQuestions: Specific design patterns or architectural decisions needed
Integration strategy clarification with existing systems
Performance optimization guidance for current implementation
Quality standards interpretation and implementation guidance
supportExpectations: Type of architectural guidance needed (design, patterns, integration)
Timeline for architectural input and decision making
Level of detail required for implementation guidance
Ongoing support requirements for implementation completion

contextPreservation.implementationProgress: Current implementation status with completed and pending work
contextPreservation.architecturalChallenges: Specific architectural challenges requiring expert input
contextPreservation.designDecisions: Design decisions needed with context and constraints
contextPreservation.qualityRequirements: Quality standards and performance requirements context
contextPreservation.implementationEvidence: Evidence of current implementation quality and compliance

validationRules.issuesWellDocumented: Requirement issues must be clearly documented with examples
validationRules.contextComplete: Complete implementation context must be provided
validationRules.alternativesExplored: Alternative approaches must have been explored
validationRules.strategicInputJustified: Need for strategic input must be clearly justified

requirementIssues: Clear description of requirement conflicts or ambiguities
Specific examples of business logic unclear or contradictory
Impact assessment of identified issues on implementation
implementationContext: Current implementation progress with completed work
Implementation challenges related to requirement issues
Alternative approaches explored and their limitations
Strategic decisions needed for implementation continuation
strategicNeeds: Strategic clarification needed for requirement resolution
Business logic clarification required for implementation
Scope change approval and impact assessment
Strategic guidance for implementation approach adjustment

contextPreservation.implementationProgress: Current implementation status with completed work
contextPreservation.businessLogicChallenges: Business logic clarification needs with examples
contextPreservation.scopeChangeImpact: Scope changes discovered with impact assessment
contextPreservation.strategicDecisionNeeds: Strategic decisions required for implementation continuation
